description: Create a new subscription plan. Accepts CreatePlanInput with tier (required, String, unique identifier), name (required, String), category (required, enum: STARTER, PROFESSIONAL, BUSINESS, ENTERPRISE), periods (required, array of PlanPeriodInput with periodType: monthly/yearly, price, credits), isActive (optional, Boolean, default true). Returns CreatePlanResponse with message (String), tier (String). Raises ConflictError (409) if tier already exists. Raises ForbiddenError (403) if not SuperAdmin.
graphql_operation: mutation CreatePlan($input: CreatePlanInput!) { billing { createPlan(input: $input) { message tier } } }
